authorBio: Hi there 👋, my name is Duc Nguyen. I'm a software engineer. When I get bored or tired of my day-to-day job, I go put random stuff on my website with no expectation to catch anyone's attention. Oh, but you're here, so, I hope you like my content. Thanks. 😁
blogDescription: Blog by Duc Nguyen - Software Engineer @ Padlet. Making the world better with code.
pageTitle: Duck Who Codes - Blog by Duc Nguyen
